metadata.title: CVE-2020-15657 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Firefox could be made to load attacker-supplied DLL files from theinstallation directory. This required an attacker that is already capableof placing files in the installation directory. *Note: This issue onlyaffected Windows operating systems. Other operating systems areunaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 78.1, Firefox < 79,and Thunderbird < 78.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
